text: I see a lot of Powerhouse Pass giveaways on LinkedIn for Inbound. Anyone here from HubSpot who has some left?

I don’t know the details of how the passes are distributed, but I would suggest if you’re interested in giving away some passes reach out to your CAM. I can’t guarantee anything, but they would know best.

Some partners may be purchasing passes to give away, some partners may also be giving away passes that are intended for their own employees.
